title: Bring Back Atma's Impaler
body: Voli clearly needs another buff. That's all.

>
> Atma + Cinderhulk.  No Thank You.

> [{quoted}](name=The Paulrus,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1h8HvY6o,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-20T14:41:28.806+0000)
>
> Right now, tanks are a healthy strong.  The last thing we need to do is push them into OP so they get nerfed back to oblivion.

Heck, some might even say they are borderline OP right now. Tanks need literally NOTHING right now. They are in an amazing spot for the most part with a few small outliers.

> [{quoted}](name=M Schumacher,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1h8HvY6o,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-20T12:06:09.296+0000)
>
> Wasn't an issue when spirit of the ancient golem gave bonus hp

RIGHT? People are acting like Cinderhulk is better than the old Jungle items (when it isn't).

Elder Lizard gave TRUE DAMAGE burn, and Ancient Golem gave a permanent blue buff (sort of). The new Jungle items are actually MUCH worse than the old ones.
Ancient Golem did nothing to speed up clear, and apart from mana regen was useless in any fights.

> [{quoted}](name=Silents429,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1h8HvY6o,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-20T17:59:31.799+0000)
>
> Ancient Golem did nothing to speed up clear, and apart from mana regen was useless in any fights.

Yes, it added a 5% bleed effect against Monsters. Not to mention that it practically added 6.5 gold per 5.

The bleed effect was worse then the sunfire we have now. And the bleed didn't carry outside of the jungle where tanks needed it.

Extra gold doesn't matter anymore considering we are making a lot more gold now anyway.
Golem wasn't also a built in sunfire, or bring tanks late game to the mid game.

i know its sort of a sarcastic thread. but atmas would give them dmg and a bit of armor. but a lot of tanks also scales with health. and not really with ad (besides sion, but sion has better shield with health) so its sort of a trade off to me. but hes the only exemple i can think of really.

TBH really atmas could only give around 50 or so unless you built flat health after that. Since it required 3300 to reach that amount, which cost wise a BF sword is actually still better. I think really if they ever did bring anything remotely like it back it would have to either scale better and JUST be the passive or something like a scaling onhit magic effect a la manamune.

So yeah it'd literally be useless on anyone other than voli (who builds HP to maximize his execute burst damage) and Sion (who desperately needs it as a core item with incoming nerfs.)

Atmas was kinda really always bad cause it never fit in to any real kit, and just made the beefy bruisers beefier.
I wonder how fast he'd get nerfed, he's already on the nope train to nerf city. He needs it at this point.

Yes please bring back Olaf's hp scaling damage on his w and then add a buffed atmas impaler while maintaining cinder-hulks current viability. >:D This would be the best game EVER if that happens.
Clearly the most balanced of all MOBA!
Atma's was pretty shit anyways. I used to like it. Then Rito nerfed it. And I never saw, nor built it again. Then it was removed.
